name: Dreams of RTX3090
description:
Pitted against a shortage and pandemic, the only place to get a 3090 is in your bed at night. Fight against the urge to shell out your life savings by destroying your dreams at the source.

Move - WASD

Jump - SPACEBAR

Quit - BACKSPACE

Game is feature incomplete as implementation became difficult. Planning to clean it up and make it even better later.
